main: ^You pass a giant statue of a beaver holding a fish.
FirstChoice: ^Everyone poses for a ridiculous photo with the statue. It's the highlight of the trip so far. (PARTY happiness +1)
SecondChoice: ^The group is a bit disappointed you didn't stop. "We'll see the next one," you promise, though no one believes you. (PARTY happiness -0.5)
ThirdChoice: ^You make a corny joke about beavers and fish. The laughter is worth it, even if it's just for the groans. (PARTY happiness +0.5)
